actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-276.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2585, a bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1980 and 1981.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2585 (Motor vehicle safety funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2585, a bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1980 and 1981.
